sentences.sContent: It is for this reason that television proves such a boon to so many people.
sentences.sCn: 正是这个原因电视机成为这么多人的一大福音。

remMethod.val: 从月亮(moon)得到恩惠(boon) → 天赐福利

trans.tranCn: 恩惠, 实惠, 福利
trans.tranOther: You can describe something as a boon when it makes life better or easier for someone
